name: Warface - Crysis Female Nanosuit Pack
detailed_description:
A body suit set consisting of four nano-suits adapted for each in-game class:
  • Female Rifleman nano-suit
  • Female Medic nano-suit
  • Female Engineer nano-suit
  • Female Sniper nano-suit

These female nano-suits straight from Crysis strike fear in any opponent. Their unique appearance is achieved by a combination of factors – stylish jet black armor tightly covering the body while not restricting movement, let alone the sheer overwhelming visual effect owing to a range of miniscule details all brought to perfection. The ideal new outfit for the true Warface amazons!

Please note: these skins are cosmetic and do not affect your character stats and data.
about_the_game:
A body suit set consisting of four nano-suits adapted for each in-game class:
  • Female Rifleman nano-suit

  • Female Sniper nano-suit

These female nano-suits straight from Crysis strike fear in any opponent. Their unique appearance is achieved by a combination of factors – stylish jet black armor tightly covering the body while not restricting movement, let alone the sheer overwhelming visual effect owing to a range of miniscule details all brought to perfection. short_description: Meet the elegant adaptation of the renowned Crysis models – the female nanosuits! These body suits will surely put you in the spotlight of your team and inspire equally as much awe as fear in foes!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2 GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or AMD ATI Radeon 3650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.6 GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT or better, AMD Radeon 3870 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
